data.title: Warner Brothers Announces all 2021 Movies will stream to HBO Max
data.meta_description: You may have seen the recent announcement from Warner Bros. that it will be releasing its entire 2021 slate of feature films on HBO Max simultaneously with the release in theaters. This is a game-changer, not just for the movie industry but for HBO subscribers, too, since they will be able to watch first-run feature [â€¦]
data.text:
You may have seen the recent announcement from Warner Bros. that it will be releasing its entire 2021 slate of feature films on HBO Max simultaneously with the release in theaters. This is a game-changer, not just for the movie industry but for HBO subscribers, too, since they will be able to watch first-run feature films on the HBO Max app on the same day they are available in theaters at no extra cost! See the full article here

The first film set to stream on HBO Max is Wonder Woman 1984. It will begin streaming on December 25, 2020 and will be available for 31 days on the HBO Max app.
